title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, August 11, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Alex Haley (1921-1992), who wrote both "The Autobiography of Malcolm X" (1965) and "Roots" (1976).
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Alex Haley (1921-1992), who wrote both "The Autobiography of Malcolm X" (1965) and "Roots" (1976).
